Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Pavillon de Montmartre in Paris (Montmartre - Sacre Coeur), you'll be minutes from Cafe des 2 Moulins and Moulin Rouge. This hotel is close to Louvre Museum and Arc de Triomphe.

Rooms
Stay in one of 30 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Breakfast is available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and an elevator (lift).


Check-in time starts at 2:00 PM Check-out time is noon
Breakfast is available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.
Stay in one of 30 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Pavillon de Montmartre in Paris (Montmartre - Sacre Coeur), you'll be minutes from Cafe des 2 Moulins and Moulin Rouge. This hotel is close to Louvre Museum and Arc de Triomphe.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Cafe des 2 Moulins - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Rue des Abbessees - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Moulin Rouge - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Espace Dali - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Place du Tertre - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Musee de Montmartre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Museum of Romantic Life - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Montmartre Funicular - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Sacred Heart Basilica - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Place de Clichy - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Theatre la Bruyere - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Gustave Moreau Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Theatre Mogador - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Paris Museum of Freemasonry - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Galeries Lafayette - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi

The nearest major airport is Paris (ORY-Orly) - 17.2 km / 10.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Pavillon de Montmartre is Paris (CDG-Charles de Gaulle) - 20 km / 12.4 mi.
